titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Congo (Democratic Republic) Collection
titlestmt.author: compiled by Carol King, Nancy Lyon, and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 10:51

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of correspondence, printed material, and photographs relating to the history of Congo (Democratic Republic) and current political, economic, and social conditions.

langmaterial.language: The materials are in English and French.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the African Collection Curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Congo (Democratic Republic) Collection (MS 1549). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: African Collection, MS 605; Pamphlet Collection, MS 1351; African Postcard Collection, MS 1575. Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material in the original accession is arranged chronologically, with photographs last. Additions to the collection may vary in arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of correspondence, printed material, and photographs relating to the history of Congo (Democratic Republic) and current political, economic, and social conditions.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
Access to materials in Accessions 2003-M-047 and 2007-M-018 is by appointment only. Contact the Head of Public Services or the Public Services Manager.

did.unittitle: Marquess of Salisbury: correspondence to the King of the Belgians concerning his rule over the Belgian Congo
"Résumé de la Campagne Arabe," by unidentified author
"Le Salut des Troupes Coloniales Belges à ceux du Pays envahi": aerial propoganda leaflet dropped over German occupied Belgium
"Travel in the Belgian Congo: Bulletin of Useful Information with Map of Principal Communications," Office National du Tourisme de Bélgique
"Diario Popular 14-10-1942," introduction to The Volcanoes , by Sake
Agricultural/technological development: reports, pamphlets, proceedings from conferences
Centre d'Information et de Documentation du Congo Belge et du Ruanda-Urundi: booklets
Houser, George: letter describing visit to Albert Schweitzer's hospital at Lamborene and related topics
Belgian writings on the Congo: commentaries, speeches, booklets
Gullion, Edmund A., U.S. Ambassador to the Republic of Congo: radio interview
"Katanga, 11th July 1960 - 11th July 1962": speech by President Tshombe
"The UN in Katanga: the futile deaths"; Katangese Ministry of Information
Mouvement Populaire de la Revolution (MPR): manifestos, resolutions
La Voix des Forces Armées Zaïroises : Bimensuel de la Défense Nationale
Mbegu: Revue Pédagogique et Culturelle , Institut Superior Pédagogique, Université Nationale du Zaïre
Congolese National Liberation Front (FLNC): posters by and about
Martens, Ludo, Party of Labour of Belgium (Marxist-Leninist): articles, papers, printed materials
U.S.-Congo Friendship Committee: articles, newsletters, pamphlets

unittitle.title: Revue du Travail: Revue Zaïroise du Travail de Parution Trimestrielle

did.unittitle: Ancien Élu du Peuple et Membre du Collège des Fondateurs de l'U.D.P.S.: lettre ouverte au Gouverneur du Shaba contre le massacre des étudiants au Campus de Lubumbashi
Milango, H. E. M. Andre, Head of Government at the Law School of Yale University: statement before the United Nations, Mission Permanente de la République du Congo
"Congo, Yesterday and Today: A background of 80 years of ruthless exploitation in the Congo": publication of The Bureau of African Affairs
The Belgian Congo: photographs with identifying material, Congopresse
"Le Programme Social de la Main d'Oeuvre Indigène," L'Illustration Congolaise
Additional printed materials, [includes proverbs and stories in the Tetela language, 1966]

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to materials in Accessions 2003-M-047 and 2007-M-018 is by appointment only. Contact the Head of Public Services or the Public Services Manager.

did.unittitle: Glass slides of the Congo [Underwood & Underwood, Geography Units, all thirty scenes are identified]
Amnesty International [report on the torture of students]
ASADHO/KATANGA (African Association for the Defense of Human Rights) [press releases]
The Cromwell Crusader , no. 1, "Cocoa Slavery Edition"
Mouvement Ouvrier et Paysan du Congo (Zaire) [statements of opinion/policy]
"Les Transports Ferroviaires en Afrique Centrale," Le D éfi in (UDEAC), no. 6

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to materials in Accessions 2003-M-047 and 2007-M-018 is by appointment only. Contact the Head of Public Services or the Public Services Manager.

did.unittitle: Hand-colored lantern slides of the Congo
Album of forty photographs depicting casualties in Katanga Province
Photograph of microscopists searching for cure of sleeping sickness (a disease prevalent in diamond mine workers)

unittitle.title: Supplément au Périodique des Droits de l'Homme
Institut National de la Statistique: Analyse de l'Inflation a Lubumbashi
Ngonge: Carnets d'Histoire et de Littérature Kongo
Jana Na Kesho: Revue des Etudiants du Département d'Histoire
Voix Muntu: Revue Culturelle et Scientifique

did.unittitle: The Thinker , English Club, University of Lubumbashi
Centre des Droits de l'Homme et du Droit Humanitaire CDH: Communiqué de presse
What Are We Doing in the Congo? , Dr. Hyman Lumer
